# Add Your Training Images Here

Place your scenario images in this directory with the following names:
- `person1.jpg`
- `person2.jpg`
- `person3.jpg`
- `person4.jpg`
- `person5.jpg`

Or update the `public/scenarios.json` file to match your actual image filenames.

## Image Guidelines
- Use clear, high-resolution images
- Images should clearly show the person and any relevant details
- Recommended size: 1280x720 or larger
- Supported formats: .jpg, .jpeg, .png, .webp
